background: Build a centralized CloudWatch monitoring system to manage 10,000+ daily API and database interactions. The solution includes a unified dashboard visualizing metrics from API Gateway, Lambda, and RDS; 8 comprehensive CloudWatch alarms for latency, errors, and performance thresholds; SNS topics for alert and report notifications; a DynamoDB audit table with TTL and GSIs for persistent alarm logging; Lambda functions for automated reporting and health checks; EventBridge rules for scheduled daily reports and hourly health checks; and IAM policies implementing least-privilege access for all components.
author: santhosh-swe
